definitions.definition: a small plastic card that you can use to buy goods and services and pay for them later
definitions.sensetop: by credit cardon your credit card

examples.text: All major credit cards are accepted at our hotels.
The safest way to pay for goods ordered online is by credit card.
I put the bill on my credit card.
Can you give me your credit card number?
He ran up a huge bill on his credit card.
My credit card expires at the end of June.
Your credit card is no longer valid.
